summary: Playable female Racemenu preset that resembles Lara Croft.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is a Racemenu preset of my interpretation of Lara Croft. I made it because of a bet and uploaded it in case some of you want it. Have fun with it.[/size]


[size=4]To use this preset, you will need:[/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=2]Racemenu[/size][/url]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP Female Body[/url] OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/url] with UUNP Morphs[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?]Ponytail Hairstyles[/url] (you will need the main file AND the alternate hair textures)[/size]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?][size=2]Demoniac Skin[/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?][size=2]Mikan Eyes[/size][/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825/?][size=2]Maevan Eyebrows[/size][/url]
[/list]

[size=4]When choosing options for your [color=#f1c232]BodySlide[/color], you will want:[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Options: Unified UNP[/size]
[*][size=2]Racemenu Plugin: Racemenu Morphs for Unified UNP[/size]
[*][size=2]Pre-built Morphable Bodies: Prebuilt UUNP + Morphs (or you can choose the HDT version if you want animated breasts and butt)[/size]
[*][size=2]UUNP Special Physics: None[/size]
[/list]

[size=4]When choosing options for [color=#f1c232]Demoniac Skin[/color], you will want:[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]Body Type: UNP[/size]
[*][size=2]DiffuseMap: Realgirl + SG Head[/size]
[*][size=2]Normalmap: SG Normalmap (that's what's in the pictures but feel free to choose your own)[/size]
[*][size=2]SpecularMap: No Gloss (it will still be slightly glossy since Demoniac just does that)[/size]
[*][size=2]Subsurface Scattering: Subsurface Disabler (not exactly necessary but I recommend this option)[/size]
[*][size=2]Optional Files: You want all three options.[/size]
[/list]

[size=4]When installing [color=#f1c232]Maevan's Eyebrows[/color], choose the standalone version.[/size]
[size=4]My Lara is a [b][color=#ff7700]Breton[/color][/b] so don't forget to choose the right race![/size]


[size=2]If you want the outfit, download [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60814/?]Katarina Armor[/url][size=2] by NewerMind43.

[/size][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ffff][size=1]By the way - the ENDORSE button doesn't bite...[/size][/color][/font]
author: chillator
